title: ZORRO (1957) 2-5 [retrOtv]
description:
ZORRO (1957) 2-5

2. Zorro&#039;s Secret Passage  10/17/1957
When Diego is challenged as to whether or not he is Zorro, he easily gets attention off of himself, but by doing so, he unwittingly casts blame on one of his friends. Will Zorro be able to save him before it&#039;s too late?
  Guest star: Britt Lomond (Captain Monastario), Romney Brent (Padre Felipe), Jan Arvan (Don Ignacio Torres), Eugenia Paul (Senorita Elena Torres) , Pat Hogan (Benito)

3. Zorro Rides to the Mission 10/24/1957
Finding that Don Torres is in hiding at the Mission, Monastario forces the local Indians into hard labor until the Padre agrees to surrender the fugitive.
  Guest star: Britt Lomond (Captain Monastario), Romney Brent (Padre Felipe), Jan Arvan (Don Ignacio Torres)

4. The Ghost of the Mission  10/31/1957
After failing in his attempt to sneak food to the fugitive in the Mission where Captain Monastario has laid siege, Zorro tries to scare the soldiers away by spreading a rumor about the mad monk who supposedly haunts the place.
  Guest star: Britt Lomond (Captain Monastario), Romney Brent (Padre Felipe), Jan Arvan (Don Ignacio Torres)

5. Zorro&#039;s Romance   11/7/1957
In order to help the escaped fugitive Torres elude Captain Monastario&#039;s surveillance of his home, Don Diego decides that he must propose marriage to Torres&#039; daughter.
  Guest star: Britt Lomond (Captain Monastario), Jan Arvan (Don Ignacio Torres), Eugenia Paul (Senorita Elena Torres) , Madeleine Holmes (Dona Luisa Torres)



Leave a comment if you&#039;d like to see more! :)
